ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISCHANGED(OwnerId),OR( Owner:Queue.QueueName ='OSS South', Owner:Queue.QueueName ='OSS North',Owner:Queue.QueueName ='OSS East',Owner:Queue.QueueName ='OSS West',Owner:Queue.QueueName ='OS Eastern',Owner:Queue.QueueName ='OS Eastern Manager'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Transfers to this Queue are no longer Allowed.
